FuncDef:
The mpls-te enable command enables the MPLS TE feature in the current OSPF area.
The undo mpls-te command disables the MPLS TE feature in the current OSPF area.
By default, the TE feature is disabled in an OSPF area.

ParaDef.Info:
Accepts only LSAs in the standard format. An LSA is rejected if it has more than one top level TLV.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
MPLS TE can be enabled in an OSPF area only after the OSPF process is enabled with the Opaque LSA function.
